attributes.action: Stop the government spending £1.3 billion in China, India and Mexico.
attributes.background: The government is planning to spend 1.3 billion pounds of taxpayers money, that's your's and mine, on improving social care in these countries. We are in crisis here, just about every news programme has items about our failing NHS and Social Services that are crying out for funding. Help stop this.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/175627
